text: Home is Move in Ready! Welcome to The Grange! New homes in Clemson, SC! Live, work and play in the 2023 HBA of Greenville Community of the Year! Beautiful one- and two-level single family homes and townhomes including main level owners suites. Located in Clemson, SC, minutes from top ranked Clemson University, Lake Hartwell, Lake Keowee, and 35 minutes to Downtown Greenville. Situated just off Hwy. 123 and within the city limits of Clemson. Stay active with access to dining, shopping, trail systems, and the fine arts. The Grange offers award winning quality craftsman architecture, James Hardie Color Plus siding, and lawn maintenance included. This is the first phase of a master planned community within the attendance area of Clemson Elementary, R.C. Edwards Middle, and D.W. Daniel High School. Welcome home to the Sutherland! This amazing 4 bedroom home features 2600 square feet of living space sure to meet all your needs. Entering from your front porch into your spacious foyer, you have an adjacent dining room with coffered ceilings that leads into the open concept kitchen and living area. The kitchen has an oversized island with farmhouse sink, peninusla for extra prep space and seating, beautiful light grey cabinetry, white Quartz countertops, tiled backsplash, under cabinet lighting, and stainless steel appliances including a gas range/oven and built in microwave. The living room has large windows to give you plenty of natural light and the gas fireplace with 2 story stone surround gives the room a cozy feel. The breakfast area leads out to the covered back porch overlooking your backyard. The Primary Suite is also on the main level and features a generous walk in closet, double sinks and amazing Roman tiled shower with two showerheads and built in seat. Once you go up the Oak staircase that overlooks the living room, you will find three additional bedrooms and two full baths, including one with two sinks. The home also comes standard with in ground irrigation, HOA provided lawn maintenance, City Provided trash pick-up, and a great location. All our homes feature our Smart Home Technology Package including a video doorbell, keyless entry and touch screen hub. Additionally, our homes are built for efficiency and comfort helping to reduce your energy costs. Our dedicated local warranty team is here for your needs after closing as well. Come visit today or call and make The Grange your new home! See Sales Agent for additional pricing information.

text: Great opportunity to own a single family home in Clemson city limits that is zoned RM4! There are very few properties in Clemson with this zoning. This brick ranch is currently being rented as the Phi Sigma Kappa fraternity. There are few properties which have a large living room, huge recreation room in the lower level, huge rear yard for activities, and yet are wonderfully and conveniently located so you can bike to campus as well as it being on the CAT bus route. This one level brick house has 4 bedrooms, 2 baths. New architectural shingle roof, windows throughout and rear deck in 2017. Hardwood floors throughout the home. The kitchen is spacious, has dining area, and open to the living area. Great backyard space! This is a rare opportunity to find RM4 zoning with a ready to go property and great tenants in place! Property is currently leased until 7/31/2025 at $2000/month. You will want to own this income property right away, so you can adjust the lease rental beginning on August 1st. The rent is quite low for this property. Call today and schedule your appt as this will go fast! Property is managed by Foothills Properties.

text: Well maintained Clemson home with detached 600 sq workshop. This home offers the tranquility of a quiet Clemson neighborhood along with being conveniently located to Clemson Elementary, Clemson University, shopping, and biking trails.The floor plan of this home offers flexible living choices with formal dining, living area, den and large lower level which offers flexibility as a large recreation area or owners suite. HVAC installed in August along with new appliances. Large workshop along with work area off of attached garage. Don't miss seeing this home!

Outstanding, well kept brick home in downtown Clemson. Located in the highly desirable, walking distance area of Riggs Drive, this home ha been well cared for with many recent upgrades to include new roof and oversized gutters. The home features a large, open living dining combo as you enter the front door that is complimented by an remodeled kitchen that opens to a comfortable den. The adjoining sun room and new deck make for great entertainment space and also allow for lots of natural light. Beautiful guest bath and guest bedroom are conveniently located just off the entry foyer and the Master bedroom i located at end of Hallway. Owners encompassed the 3rd guest bedroom and remodeled that space into a large, master bathrooom/closet area. The lower level features a 2nd fireplace, rec room, storage/unfinished space and the 3rd bedroom and full bath. Access to a very nice patio leads to a very private, level back yard with former garden area. The entire lawn is beautiful, well-maintained zoysia and is very level.

Discover Clemson's newest gem! If you missed out on Rosewood's Clemson Cottages, now is the time to buy your dream home in Clemson, SC! This low maintenance community features 20 lots perfectly located within 10 minutes of Downtown Clemson.

text: Welcome to The Grange! New homes in Clemson, SC! Live, work and play in the 2023 HBA of Greenville Community of the Year!
